channel.title: R Markdown on My Awesome Site
channel.description: Recent content in R Markdown on My Awesome Site

item.title: TestPost
item.description: Here we are testing out R code x<-data.frame(dat=rnorm(1000)) x %>% ggplot(aes(x=dat))+geom_histogram() ## `stat_bin()` using `bins = 30`. Pick better value with `binwidth`.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown Blah is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
